comments: Snippets 000, 001, and 003 in the examples plugin under org.eclipse.jface.examples.databinding.snippets are broken.

Created an attachment (id=51998)
Fix for snippet 000

Adding Dave to the CC as I haven't had time to look at the ComboViewer issues (001, 003) yet.  Both of these snippets throw the following exception:

Exception in thread "main" org.eclipse.jface.internal.databinding.provisional.BindingException: incompatible updatables: target is observable list with labels, model is org.eclipse.jface.internal.databinding.internal.beans.JavaBeanObservableList
	at org.eclipse.jface.internal.databinding.provisional.viewers.ViewersBindingFactory.createBinding(ViewersBindingFactory.java:64)
	at org.eclipse.jface.internal.databinding.provisional.DataBindingContext.doCreateBinding(DataBindingContext.java:181)
	at org.eclipse.jface.internal.databinding.provisional.DataBindingContext.bind(DataBindingContext.java:166)
	at org.eclipse.jface.internal.databinding.provisional.DataBindingContext.bind(DataBindingContext.java:210)
	at org.eclipse.jface.internal.databinding.provisional.DataBindingContext.bind(DataBindingContext.java:246)
	at org.eclipse.jface.examples.databinding.snippets.Snippet001NestedSelectionWithCombo$View.createShell(Snippet001NestedSelectionWithCombo.java:199)
	at org.eclipse.jface.examples.databinding.snippets.Snippet001NestedSelectionWithCombo.main(Snippet001NestedSelectionWithCombo.java:43)
*** Bug 163441 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Yes I think only one of them does not work.

If someone would like to write more snippets, please go ahead! ;-)

See http://wiki.eclipse.org/index.php/JFace_Data_Binding_Scenarios, this describes what we planned to support when we started the work on data binding.  We turned most of these into automated tests, but some would make for interesting snippets too.
These should be resolved in Bug116920_investigation branch once attachment 53272 is applied.  Snippets 002 and 003 don't work 100% correctly because of bug 147128 but there are no more exceptions.
Because of the merge to HEAD (bug 116920) these are FIXED > 20061110.
